name: aimake
description: A build tool designed to avoid complex configurations. GNU GPL3 or later.

name: Autoconf
description: An extensible package of M4 macros that produce shell scripts to automatically configure software source code packages. Part of the Autotools. GNU GPL3 or later.

name: Automake
description: A tool for automatically generating Makefile.in files compliant with the GNU Coding Standards. Requires the use of Autoconf. Part of the Autotools. GNU GPL3 or later.

name: Jam
description: A build system, designed to be easier than make. Understands C build rules implicitly. Jam License.

name: Libtool
description: A generic library support script. Part of the Autotools. GNU GPL3 or later.

name: Meson
description: An extremely fast, user-friendly build system. Based on Ninja. Apache2.0.

name: Clang
description: A C compiler for LLVM. Supports C11. NCSA.

name: CompCert
description: A fully-verified C compiler. Supports almost all of C89. GNU GPL2.1 or later.

name: GCC
description: Provides a C compiler as part of its compiler set. Supports C11 and OpenMP. GNU GPL3 or later.

name: PCC
description: A venerable C compiler. Supports C99. Various licenses, all free.

name: TCC
description: Tiny C Compiler; a small, fast C compiler. Supports C99 (except complex types). GNU LGPL2.1 only.

name: GnuTLS
description: A secure communication library, implementing SSL, TLS and DTLS. GNU LGPL2.1 or later.

name: libgcrypt
description: A general-purpose cryptography library, with a range of available ciphers. GNU LGPL2.1 or later (code), GNU GPL2.1 or later (manual and tools).

name: OpenSSL
description: Implementation of the SSL and TLS protocols, and also includes a cryptography library. Dual Licensed under the OpenSSL License and the SSLeay License.

name: libsodium
description: A modern and easy-to-use crypto library. Expat.

name: libtomcrypt
description: A fairly comprehensive, modular and portable cryptographic toolkit. Public domain.

name: mbed TLS
description: Another crypto implementation for C. Apache2.0.

name: BerkeleyDB
description: A library for a high-performance embedded database for key-value data. GNU AGPLv3 only.

name: Hiredis

name: LMDB
description: An ultra-fast, ultra-compact key-value embedded data store. newOpenLDAP.

name: MariaDB

name: mongo-c-driver

name: PostgreSQL
description: A powerful object-relational database system. PostgreSQL licence.

name: recutils

name: Redis

name: sophia

name: DocOnce
